com.kaichunlin.transition

Class ViewTransitionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kaichunlin.transition.BaseTransitionBuilder<ViewTransitionBuilder,ViewTransition>
      • com.kaichunlin.transition.ViewTransitionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.kaichunlin.transition.BaseTransition.Setup, ViewTransition.Setup, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ViewTransitionBuilder
extends BaseTransitionBuilder<ViewTransitionBuilder,ViewTransition>
implements ViewTransition.Setup
    Allows the easy creation of ViewTransition

    Created by Kai-Chun Lin on 2015/4/23.
